en.welcome: Welcome. What would you like to do?
en.enter_fix_amount: Enter the fixed trading amount you would like to use.
en.enter_percent_balance: Enter the percentage of your balance you want to allocate for trading.
en.fix_amount_set: Your fixed trading amount is now set to `{}`.
en.percent_balance_set: The percentage of your balance to trade is now set to `{}`.
en.invalid_number: Please enter a valid number for the trading amount or percentage.
en.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address for your account registration.
en.set_account_type_real:
You have selected a `Real` account type. 
Please register your account email to proceed.
en.set_account_type_practice:
You have selected a `Practice` account type. 
Please register your account email to proceed.
en.account_not_found: We couldn't find your account email in our records.
en.account_credentials_not_found: Account email or password not found.
en.register_email:
Your account email has been registered successfully. 
Now, please set your account password.
en.enter_account_email: Please enter your account email to register.
en.account_registered: Congratulations! Your account has been registered successfully.
en.send_me_message: Please send me a message with your request or feedback.
en.manual: Here are the instructions for using the bot...
en.no_subscription:
It seems you don't have an active subscription. 
Please /subscribe to start using the bot.
en.register_account: Please register your account to access the bot's features.
en.scheduled: You have set a schedule for {} in UTC-{}.
en.stopped: Your bot has been stopped. You can restart it anytime.
en.started: Your bot is now active and ready for trading.
en.trade_unsuccessful: Trade at {} unsuccessful. Please check your balance and try again.
en.deposit: Hello valued subscriber! This is just a quick reminder about maintaining your active subscription status for `{}`. To keep your account in good standing, please deposit $`{}` to the following address: `{}`.
